entropy theory

$$p(x)=\Pr \left \{ X=x \right \},x \in \mathbb{X}$$

$$H(X)=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X} } p(x)\log p(x)$$

$(X,Y)\sim p(x,y)$

$$H(X|Y)=\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X}}\sum_{y \in \mathbb{Y}} p(x,y)\log \frac{p(y)}{p(x,y)}$$

$I(X;Y)$

$$I(X;Y)=H(X)-H(X|Y)=H(Y)-H(Y|X)$$

entropy calculations

$$S_{i}^{rand}=H(X)=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X} } p_{i}(x)\log p_{i}(x)
=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X}_{i} } \frac{1}{\left \| \mathbb{X}_{i} \right \|}\log \frac{1}{\left \| \mathbb{X}_{i} \right \|} 
= \log \left \| \mathbb{X}_{i} \right \|$$

$$S_{i}^{unc}=H(X)=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X} } p_{i}(x)\log p_{i}(x)
=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X} } 
\frac{\lambda_{i,x}}{\lambda_{i} }
\log \frac{\lambda_{i,x}}{\lambda_{i} }$$

$$S_{i}^{rand} \geqslant S_{i}^{unc}$$

$$S_{i}^{real}\approx S_{i}^{st}=H(X|T,S)
=-\sum_{x \in \mathbb{X} }\sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} }\sum_{s \in \mathbb{S}} p_{i}(x,t,s)
\log \frac{p_{i}(x,t,s)}{p_{i}(t,s) }$$

$$H(X|T,S)=H(X)-I(X;T)-I(X;S|T)$$

$$S_{i}^{unc} \geqslant S_{i}^{st} \geqslant  S_{i}^{real}$$

$\lim_{n\rightarrow \infty }I(X;C_{n} | C_{1}, \cdots ,C_{n-1}) \rightarrow 0$

lower bound 

$R$

$$R=\sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} } p(t) \pi_{t}= \sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} } p(t) \Pr(X= \hat x_{ML}^{t} | t) $$

$t \in \mathbb{T} \subset \mathbb{C}$

$$\Pi = \sum_{c_{i} \in \mathbb{C} } p(c_{i})\pi_{i} 
= \sum_{c_{i} \in \mathbb{C} } \left (  \sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} } p(t)p(c_{i} | t) \right ) \pi_{i}
= \sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} }p(t) \left (  \sum_{c_{i} \in \mathbb{C} } p(c_{i} | t)  \pi_{i}\right )
\geq \sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} }p(t) \left (  \sum_{c_{i} \in \mathbb{C} } p(c_{i} | t)  \Pr(X=\hat x_{ML}^{t} | c_{i})\right )
=\sum_{t \in \mathbb{T} } p(t)\Pr(X=\hat x_{ML}^{t}|t)  
= R$$

where $\hat x_{ML}$ is the userâ€™s most visited category during the hour $t$, and $t \in \mathbb{T} \subset \mathbb{C}$. The inequality is because $\pi_{i} = \sup_{\hat x_{a}}\left \{  \Pr(X=\hat x_{a}|c_{i})  \right \}  \geq  \Pr(X=\hat x_{ML}^{t} | c_{i})$. Therefore, it is reasonable to use R as the lower bound of predictability
